name: chevron moss stitch advent scarf
notes:
✨ english pattern written in english, in uk/us standard terms.

note: this is a listing for a crochet pattern and is delivered via digital instant download. 

pattern:
downloadable crochet pattern - chevron moss stitch advent scarf

description:
this is a pattern for the chevron moss stitch advent scarf written pattern! perfect to use your advent minis!

size:
finished scarf – approximately 148cm x 18cm (instructions to make wider and also can make to any lkength you want).

skill level:
beginner

materials you will need:
hook - 5mm 
yarn - any dk weight yarn
scissors 
tapestry/wool needle
